hi radioman...

firstly I want to say very very good project.Well done!

On windows platform everything is going well. I have to develope windows ce verstion of monitoring system.I converted windows mobile project to windows ce device project.When I run it on windows ce 5.0 or 6.0 Monitor2 from OpenNETCF library fails on wait() and waitAll() methods.It throws exception and I dont know how to resolve it.Any kind of help will be appretiated.

for sharing all what you have done.

Regards,
